model.name: New_Oracle
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CD_LOCATION ( LOCATION_ID string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"LOCATION_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), ENTITY_ID string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENTITY_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), ENTITY_TYPE string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENTITY_TYPE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), ENTITY_LOCATION_TYPE string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENTITY_LOCATION_TYPE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), PHASE string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PHASE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), GEO_OFFSET_EAST bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"GEO_OFFSET_EAST"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), GEO_OFFSET_NORTH bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"GEO_OFFSET_NORTH"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ELEVATION bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ELEVATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ORG_ID string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ORG_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), MEASURE_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MEASURE_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), REMARKS string(2000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"REMARKS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CREATE_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CREATE_USER_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_USER_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CREATE_APP_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_APP_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), UPDATE_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UPDATE_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), UPDATE_USER_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UPDATE_USER_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CHECK_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CHECK_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CHECK_USER_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CHECK_USER_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), BSFLAG string(1) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"BSFLAG"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), SEND_INDICATE string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SEND_INDICATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CREATE_ORG_ID string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_ORG_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), UPDATE_ORG_ID string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UPDATE_ORG_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), SOURCE string(65) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SOURCE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), ORIGINAL_ELEVATION bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ORIGINAL_ELEVATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEBEZIUM"."CD_LOCATION"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: view2
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW CD_LOCATION ( LOCATION_ID string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"LOCATION_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), ENTITY_ID string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENTITY_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), ENTITY_TYPE string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENTITY_TYPE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), ENTITY_LOCATION_TYPE string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENTITY_LOCATION_TYPE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), PHASE string(32) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PHASE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), GEO_OFFSET_EAST bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"GEO_OFFSET_EAST"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), GEO_OFFSET_NORTH bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"GEO_OFFSET_NORTH"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ELEVATION bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ELEVATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ORG_ID string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ORG_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR2'), MEASURE_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MEASURE_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), REMARKS string(2000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"REMARKS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CREATE_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CREATE_USER_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_USER_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CREATE_APP_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_APP_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), UPDATE_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UPDATE_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), UPDATE_USER_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UPDATE_USER_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CHECK_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CHECK_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CHECK_USER_ID string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CHECK_USER_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), BSFLAG string(1) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"BSFLAG"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), SEND_INDICATE string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SEND_INDICATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), CREATE_ORG_ID string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CREATE_ORG_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), UPDATE_ORG_ID string(32) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UPDATE_ORG_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), SOURCE string(65) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SOURCE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NVARCHAR2'), ORIGINAL_ELEVATION bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ORIGINAL_ELEVATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEBEZIUM"."CD_LOCATION"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.LOCATION_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.ENTITY_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.ENTITY_TYPE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.ENTITY_LOCATION_TYPE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.PHASE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.GEO_OFFSET_EAST, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.GEO_OFFSET_NORTH, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.ELEVATION, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.ORG_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.MEASURE_DATE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.REMARKS, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.CREATE_DATE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.CREATE_USER_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.CREATE_APP_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.UPDATE_DATE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.UPDATE_USER_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.CHECK_DATE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.CHECK_USER_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.BSFLAG, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.SEND_INDICATE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.CREATE_ORG_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.UPDATE_ORG_ID, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.SOURCE, OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION.ORIGINAL_ELEVATION FROM OracleDS1.CD_LOCATION;
